sentences: James Douglas Vallance,  (born May 31, 1952) is a Canadian songwriter, arranger and producer.
Vallance is best known as Bryan Adams' songwriting partner from 1978 to 1989 and again from 2005 to 2019.

He grew up in a series of small towns on the west coast of Canada, including Vanderhoof (1964-1967) and Terrace (1967-1970) where he collected fond memories that would later show up in lyrics to some of his songs, like 'Summer of '69'.
